title: Meanwhile... Popcorn Shortage Looms | Diners Lick A Restaurant Wall In Arizona
description:
Meanwhile... Stephen is concerned that moviegoers may not be able to enjoy popcorn when they head to theaters this summer, the European Union looks to force Apple to use USB-C chargers on iPhones, and restaurant patrons in Arizona are being encouraged to lick a wall made of salt.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
